item.title: Baci Di Alassio
item.description: They can be preserved at room temperature for roughly a week. I strongly advise against freezing. I think they are best after one or two days, not immediately after made.

item.title: Apple Pie
item.description: This is one of my all-time favorite cakes, good for all seasons and both for breakfast and dessert.

item.title: Almond cookies
item.description: This is my quick and simplified version of almond bakies (which are like cookies, but are baked instead of cooked).

item.title: Pesto
item.description: Preservation Pesto can be preserved in the fridge for a few days and can be frozen if necessary. I personally use an ice-cube mold so I can have pesto-cubes to unfreeze when needed. Vegan For a ðŸŒ¿veganðŸŒ¿ alternative to the recipe replace both parmigiano and pecorino with finely ground cashew nuts. Faster For a faster alternative you can put all ingredients in a food processor.
